about: Recent IT graduate with a specialization in Software Development with a GPA of 3.72 eager to work in a team to develop innovative software. Experience working on developing web applications using the MERN stack and managing databases using SQLPlus. Excited to work and gain real-world experience.

tasks: Heavily involved in UI/UX of the website and created components for front-end use
Developed components involved in retrieving data from MongoDB database
Maintained and updated list of deliverables to help the team stay on track
Collaborated with C-level executives to determine website requirements
